item.title: Bulkhead
item.content:encoded:
Bulkhead 패턴

선박의 격벽(bulkhead)에서 따온 이름 배에 구멍이 나도 격벽(bulkhead)이 있으면 한 구역만 침수되고 나머지는 안전하다. 외부 API(IGDB, Steam)가 먹통이어도 해당 호출에 할당된 스레드만 잠기고, 나머지 스레드는 DB 전용 기능을 정상 처리한다.

동작 흐름

톰캣 스레드풀 (30개)
        ┌───────────────────────────────────────────────┐
        │                                            │
        │  ┌── IGDB 격벽 (maxConcurrentCalls=3) ─┐    │
        │  │  스레드 1: IGDB 호출 중 (10초 대기)   │    │
        │  │  스레드 2: IGDB 호출 중 (10초 대기)   │    │
        │  │  스레드 3: IGDB 호출 중 (10초 대기)   │    │
        │  │  스레드 4: → BulkheadFullException! │    │ ← 4번째부터 즉시 실패→fallback
        │  └───────────────────────────────────────┘    │
        │                                            │
        │  ┌── Steam 격벽 (maxConcurrentCalls=2) ─┐    │
        │  │  스레드 5: Steam 호출 중                 │    │
        │  │  스레드 6: Steam 호출 중                 │    │
        │  └────────────────────────────────────────┘    │
        │                                            │
        │  나머지 24개 스레드:                        │
        │  좋아요, 리뷰, 추천, 라이브러리 조회 등        │
        │  → 외부 API 장애와 무관하게 정상 처리            │
        │                                            │
        └───────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Bulkhead 없음

톰캣 스레드풀 200개 (전체 공유)
        │
        ├── IGDB 호출 요청 ──→ 스레드 점유 (최대 27초)
        ├── IGDB 호출 요청 ──→ 스레드 점유
        ├── IGDB 호출 요청 ──→ 스레드 점유
        ├── ...               (IGDB 먹통이면 계속 쌓임)
        │
        ├── 게임 리뷰 조회 ──→ 스레드 못 받음 ❌
        ├── 라이브러리 조회 ──→ 스레드 못 받음 ❌
        └── 로그인 ──────────→ 스레드 못 받음 ❌

없을 때 IGDB 장애 → 100명 검색 요청 → 스레드 전부 IGDB 대기 (각 40초) → 좋아요/리뷰/추천 전부 마비 (cascading failure)

IGDB 하나 때문에 DB만 쓰는 기능까지 전부 마비된다.

Bulkhead 있음

톰캣 스레드풀 200개
        │
        ├── IGDB 전용 격리 구획 (20개만 허용)
        │     ├── IGDB 호출 ──→ 점유
        │     ├── IGDB 호출 ──→ 점유
        │     ├── ...          (20개 꽉 차면)
        │     └── 21번째 ─────→ 즉시 거절 (대기 없이 fallback)
        │
        ├── 게임 리뷰 조회 ──→ 정상 처리 ✅
        ├── 라이브러리 조회 ──→ 정상 처리 ✅
        └── 로그인 ──────────→ 정상 처리 ✅

있을 때 IGDB 장애 → 3명만 IGDB 대기 (격벽 안) → 4번째부터 즉시 BulkheadFullException → fallback 반환 (0초) → 나머지 스레드로 좋아요/리뷰/추천 정상 처리

IGDB가 죽어도 나머지 180개 스레드는 온전히 다른 기능에 사용된다.

Circuit Breaker가 "언제 포기할지"를 결정한다면, Bulkhead는 "몇 명까지 시도하게 할지"를 제한하는 역할을 한다. 핵심은 "IGDB에 동시에 몇 명까지 전화를 걸 수 있는가"를 제한하는 것이다. 제한 초과하면 전화를 걸지도 않고 즉시 fallback을 준다.

maxWaitDuration: 0s인 이유

격벽이 꽉 찼을 때 대기하면 Bulkhead 의미가 없다. 즉시 실패 → fallback → 사용자에게 로컬 DB 결과 또는 "잠시 후 다시 시도" 반환.

item.title: IVF Services Market To Reach USD 48.02 Billion By 2032 At 8.6% CAGR
item.content:encoded:
IVF Services Market size was valued at USD 24.59 billion in 2024, and the total IVF Services revenue is expected to grow at a CAGR of 8.6% from 2025 to 2032, reaching nearly USD 48.02 billion by 2032. The strong growth trajectory of the IVF Services Market reflects increasing infertility prevalence, delayed parenthood trends, expanding awareness about assisted reproductive technologies, and continuous advancements in fertility treatment procedures.

Browse In-depth Market Research Report ➤ https://www.maximizemarketresearch.com/market-report/global-ivf-services-market/29546/

In vitro fertilization (IVF) has become one of the most effective and widely adopted assisted reproductive technologies worldwide. Changing lifestyles, rising stress levels, hormonal disorders, and growing cases of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) and male infertility are significantly contributing to the growing demand for IVF services. Additionally, improved success rates, technological integration, and supportive regulatory frameworks in several countries are further accelerating market expansion.

Market Growth Drivers

The IVF Services Market is primarily driven by the increasing incidence of infertility among couples globally. According to global health estimates, infertility affects millions of couples, leading to a growing reliance on advanced reproductive technologies. The trend of delayed marriages and postponed pregnancies due to career priorities and lifestyle changes is also increasing demand for fertility treatments.

Technological advancements such as time-lapse embryo imaging, genetic screening, cryopreservation techniques, and minimally invasive procedures have significantly improved success rates. Furthermore, increasing acceptance of assisted reproductive treatments, including donor egg cycles and fertility preservation services, is strengthening the market outlook.

Growing medical tourism for fertility treatments, particularly in countries offering cost-effective and high-quality services, is also contributing to the expansion of the IVF Services Market. Enhanced insurance coverage in selected regions and supportive government initiatives are expected to further stimulate market growth.

Market Segmentation

The IVF Services Market is segmented by cycle type and product type, enabling comprehensive service offerings tailored to patient needs.

By Cycle Type • Fresh IVF Cycles (Non-Donor) • Thawed IVF Cycles (Non-Donor) • Donor Egg IVF Cycles

Fresh IVF cycles remain widely used due to established clinical protocols and high success rates. Thawed IVF cycles are gaining momentum with improvements in embryo freezing technologies such as vitrification. Donor egg IVF cycles are increasingly adopted among older women and patients with ovarian insufficiency, supporting higher pregnancy success probabilities.

Buy Now Premium Research Report ➤ https://www.maximizemarketresearch.com/request-sample/29546/

By Product Type • Instruments • Reagent • Media

Instruments segment includes laboratory equipment and micromanipulation devices essential for fertilization procedures. Reagents and culture media play a critical role in embryo development and preservation, making them integral to IVF success rates. Continuous innovation in laboratory technologies and consumables is enhancing procedural efficiency and patient outcomes.

Market Benefits

The IVF Services Market offers multiple benefits to patients and healthcare providers:

improved success rates through advanced reproductive technologies • availability of personalized fertility treatment options • expanding global accessibility of fertility clinics • increasing insurance support in developed regions • growing awareness and social acceptance of assisted reproduction These advantages are fostering confidence among patients and encouraging early adoption of fertility treatments.

Competitive Landscape And Key Players

The IVF Services Market is highly competitive, with specialized fertility clinics and global reproductive health networks expanding their footprint across regions. Key players in North America include:

Southern California Reproductive Center – Beverly Hills, California, USA • Shady Grove Fertility – Rockville, Maryland, USA • Reproductive Medicine Associates – Basking Ridge, New Jersey, USA • Boston IVF – Waltham, Massachusetts, USA • Pacific Fertility Center – San Francisco, California, USA Browse In-depth Market Research Report ➤ https://www.maximizemarketresearch.com/request-sample/29546/

Key players in Europe include:

IVI-RMA Global – Madrid, Spain • Bourn Hall Clinic – Cambridge, United Kingdom • CARE Fertility – Nottingham, United Kingdom • Fertility Center Berlin – Berlin, Germany • GIREXX – Münster, Germany These organizations focus on expanding clinical networks, investing in advanced laboratory technologies, and enhancing patient-centered care. Strategic collaborations, research initiatives, and cross-border treatment programs are key strategies adopted by leading market participants.

Regional Insights

North America holds a significant share of the IVF Services Market due to advanced healthcare infrastructure, higher awareness levels, and insurance coverage support. Europe remains a strong market driven by technological innovation and established fertility centers. The Asia-Pacific region is emerging as a high-growth market due to rising infertility rates, increasing healthcare investments, and expanding medical tourism.

Future Outlook

With a projected CAGR of 8.6% through 2032, the IVF Services Market is expected to nearly double in value, reaching USD 48.02 billion. Continued innovation in reproductive technologies, broader insurance inclusion, and rising social acceptance are anticipated to sustain long-term market growth.

As fertility treatments become more accessible and technologically advanced, the IVF Services Market is poised to play a critical role in addressing global reproductive health challenges while delivering improved outcomes for aspiring parents worldwide.

item.title: Is Sage 50 Cloud Hosting Worth It? Benefits, Costs, and Setup
item.content:encoded:
Switching Sage 50 accounting software to the cloud can be a great choice for the businesses. It offers flexible, secure, and remote data access from anywhere/anytime. The Sage 50 Cloud Hosting setup eliminates expensive IT hardware maintenance while allowing teams to work simultaneously from anywhere, improving productivity during peak seasons. Moreover, you will get real-time collaboration, an advanced security system, and automatic backups.

In this blog post, you will explore the core benefits and the straightforward setup process that make hosted Sage 50 a superior choice in 2026, along with guidance on getting expert assistance quickly through +1-844-341-4437 when needed.

 

 

Why Should You Choose Sage 50 Cloud Hosting?

Choosing the Sage 50 Cloud Hosting allows businesses to access their accounting software from anywhere at any time, enhancing remote collaboration and flexibility. The key benefits you will get include enhanced security, automatic backups, reduced IT maintenance costs, and improved performance. It is a cost-effective, scalable solution and is especially ideal for organizations looking to streamline workflows and improve data safety.

Here are the primary reasons to choose Sage 50 Cloud Hosting:

  1. Your business team members can work on the same financial data together from different locations, facilitating remote work.
  2. Hosting providers offer advanced security features, like SSL encryption and automatic, regular backups, reducing the risk of data loss.
  3. This Setup eliminates the need for expensive in-house server hardware and IT staff for handling the business operations. On the other hand, Cloud utility offers a flexible, pay-as-you-go pricing model.
  4. The software always stays updated with the latest features and security patches, minimizing downtime, so you don't need to manually update the system.
  5. As your business grows, you can easily add more users or increase resources without significant disruptions.
  6. You can easily integrate with tools like Microsoft 365, CRM, and payroll systems, increasing efficiency without paying for other resources.
  7. The cloud features offer constant, uninterrupted access to your accounting data, allowing for flexibility in managing business operations.

 

Understand the Core Benefits of Sage 50 Cloud Hosting

Sage 50 Cloud flexibility provides several benefits by moving the traditional desktop accounting software into a secure, internet-accessible environment. This hybrid approach combines powerful desktop features with modern cloud utility.

Here is the breakdown of Sage 50 Cloud Hosting Core Features:

  1. Anywhere, Anytime Access: As a Sage 50 cloud user, you can access your Sage 50 software from laptops, tablets, or smartphones, enabling remote work with a stable internet connection.
  2. Cost Efficiency: It reduces the upfront cost you spend on hiring IT staff and the expensive in-house hardware maintenance. By switching to the cloud, you don't need to waste your money on other resources.
  3. Seamless Team Collaboration: Multiple team members, accountants, or clients can work simultaneously on the same File without data conflicts, version errors, or the need to email large files.
  4. Easy to Use: You will get absolute freedom to access, share files, and use the Sage 50 software whenever you need. With the latest tools and features, you can simplify your business's challenging operations.
  5. Enhanced Data Security: Your business-sensitive data is stored in cloud technology and protected by encrypted and monitored data centers, often providing superior protection to the users. Only authorized users can access the data.
  6. 24/7 Customer Care: The Sage 50 Cloud Hosting provides round-the-clock customer care services for the users via helpline number, chat support, and email to resolve the issues quickly.
  7. Automatic Updates: Switching to the cloud means you don't need to take backups and updates manually. It will automatically update the features and take backups to prevent data loss.

 

 

How to Set Up the Sage 50 Cloud Hosting?

To set up Sage 50 Cloud Hosting, you need to follow the steps below carefully and streamline your business operations with the help of cloud features.

Here's how to set up the Sage 50 cloud:

Select a Hosting Provider & Plan

First, you choose a reliable 3rd party hosting provider who has in-depth knowledge of cloud technology to handle your business the way you want.

Prepare the Cloud Environment

  1. Once you have access to your cloud server, download the Sage 50 installation file.
  2. Ensure the server meets infrastructure requirements like a stable internet and CPU/Memory.

Install Sage 50 on the Cloud Server

  1. Run the installer within the cloud desktop environment.
  2. Select "Yes" to configure the firewall to allow Sage 50 connectivity.
  3. Choose installation type "Server" or "Typical", depending on whether it's a dedicated terminal server.

Activate Sage 50

  1. Now, open the Sage 50 software.
  2. Go to the help tab and activate the product, enter the serial number, account number, and the activation key of the account.

Set Up Company Data

  1. After entering the admin credentials, you need to create a new company or upload your existing company files to the cloud server.
  2. Ensure the data file is stored in a shared location on the cloud server, not on your local machine.

Configure Multi-User Access

  1. Within Sage 50, go to File and choose Add User to create accounts for other users.
  2. Set up permissions under Setup and select Setup Users.
  3. Lastly, set up the remote access if you need to synchronize data with the local installations.

 

Pricing Structure of Sage 50 Cloud Hosting

Sage 50 cloud hosting pricing is generally structured as a monthly subscription fee per User. Often it depends on the provider, server type, and performance requirements. This price is separate from the annual license fee paid directly to Sage for the software itself.

Here is a general breakdown of the Sage 50 cloud hosting pricing structure:

  1. Per User / Per Month: The most common model, where costs scale with the number of users accessing the system.
  2. Shared Hosting: Lower-cost option where resources are shared with other businesses, suitable for smaller teams.
  3. Dedicated Hosting: Higher-cost, customized environment that provides better performance, higher security, and dedicated server resources for larger, more challenging businesses.

 

Final Thoughts!

Migrating to Sage 50 Cloud Hosting can be an innovative move for businesses looking to update their financial operations. By moving from traditional desktop to a secure, remotely access cloud environment, businesses can gain remote, real-time collaboration with advanced encryption and automatic backups. The cloud model effectively eliminates the need of expensive in-house server maintenance and manual software updates.

With 24/7 customer care and simple integration with other tools, businesses can improve their productivity and data safety. If your goal is to streamline workflows while reducing IT costs, Sage 50 Cloud is the perfect solution for the growing companies.

item.title: Why Sports Massage Therapy Improves Athletic Performance
item.content:encoded:
The athletes are continually seeking effective, yet safe, ways of enhancing performance, preventing sports trauma, and healing faster after intense training. One of the traditional methods that has been popular is the Sports massage therapy. This is because sports massage services are increasingly gaining popularity among amateur and professional athletes because of their ability to increase financial and mental stamina. Recovery. Since sports massage therapy prioritizes muscular health, circulation, and recovery, sports massage therapy is vital in assisting athletes to perform optimally. Sports Massage Dover is a facility that provides focused therapy to enhance performance and faster recovery of muscles, as well as reduce the risk of sports-related injuries.Sports Massage Dover

The understanding of Sports Massage Therapy

Sports massage is a particular form of massage that is formulated to suit people who engage in physical activity. Treatment. Compared to a relaxing massage, sports massage is directed to the hard and stressed areas of muscles due to exhausting training and repetitive movements. The techniques used in sports therapy include deep tissue healing, stretching, compression, and friction, with all these techniques being applied in a comprehensive knowledge of sporting kinetics. Such a form of therapy may be employed to prepare the body for the training, in keeping the muscles active during the games, or accelerate recovery after sports.

Improved Oxygen Supply and Blood flow

One of the primary means through which sports massage therapy is able to enhance the performance of athletes is by improving the flow of blood. During intense activity, more oxygen and nutrients are needed by the muscles. Through this dilation of blood in some parts of the muscles, sports massage enhances the blood delivery of nutrients to the tissues. Furthermore, it enhances circulation, which helps in eliminating metabolic waste products stored due to physical activity, like lactic acid. These poisonous elements lead to fatigue, pain, and reduced performance if they are not eliminated in the connective tissue.

Elderly Personality Improved Motion and Muscle Flexibility

There is no way to deny the fact that flexibility is a crucial aspect of athletic performance, whichever method is used. Squeaky muscles restrict the amount of movement, generate less force, and increase the risk of injury. Sports massage therapy assists to get rid of adhesions that develop over time due to sustained tension and stretched muscle fibers. Musculature is more flexible, which allows joints to move across the whole axis of movement. This produces enhanced, strong, fluid movements and more coordinated movements. Frequent sport massage services make the athletes play better on the field, court, or track by improving their agility, quickness, and overall muscle control.

Faster Recovery between Exercises

Recovery is equally important to training. Physical stress, unless the body is given sufficient rest, cannot be adapted, leading to overtraining and poor performance. The therapy of sports massage reduces aggravation and soreness of the muscles, and quickens the healing. Small tears develop in muscles because of hard labor. The faster healing of tissues is achieved through sports massage since it restores those fibers in the healing process. Long-term additional exercises are increasingly able to occur and be more effective, as the athletes can train earlier and with reduced challenges because their muscles become less pliable.

Avoiding Damages and Reducing the Strain Potential

Injuries may stop the growth of an athlete and severely influence his/her performance. Sports massage therapy can prevent injuries by eliminating muscle imbalances, rigidity, and tension accumulation areas before they cause significant problems. Sports massage reduces the chances of bruises, sprains, and overuse injuries since muscles remain flexible and healthy. Regular meetings also help therapists to detect potential issues at the initial stage so that the athletes can modify the training sessions or remedy difficulties before an event.

Increased Neuromuscular Performance

Interaction between the nerves and the muscles is equally important to athletic performance as the strength of the muscles. Sports massage therapy enhances the effectiveness of neurons by releasing muscle tension, which hinders nerve transmission. When muscles are relaxed and at rest, they respond to the brain's information faster and more accurately. In athletics, this increased control results in a high quality of timing, precision, and control. After undergoing sports massage therapy, athletes have been known to report experiencing a sense of lightness, fast response, and better connectivity with their bodies.

Final words

Sports massage is not a luxury and is not a rarely occurring activity. It is a useful application for performance enhancement that assists the body with its inherent ability of movement, recovery, and success. The benefits of sports massage treatment are short and long-term provisions, such as improving circulation and laxity, decreasing injury risk, and enhancing mental attention. Frequent sports massage has made the athletes perform better, recover faster, and have more confidence in their capabilities as individuals.

Understanding Mirth Connect in Healthcare Integration Mirth Connect is a powerful open-source integration engine widely used in healthcare IT. Custom Mirth Connect Development Services help bridge these gaps by designing, configuring, and optimizing interfaces tailored to specific operational workflows. item.title: Start Your Musical Adventure with Drum Classes
item.content:encoded:
The pulse of music begins with the drums, an instrument that offers endless excitement and physical energy. Enrolling in drum classes provides students with a roadmap to success, guiding them through the complexities of rhythm and timing. MC Music Store & Academy, established in 2012, brings its world-class pedagogy to Kuala Lumpur, offering a unique opportunity for enthusiasts to learn from the best in the industry.

Locating the Best Drum Class Near Me

For many residents in the city, the search for a drum class near me leads them to the doorstep of MC Music. Our first Malaysian combined store and learning center is strategically located to serve the vibrant community of Kuala Lumpur. We provide an environment that is both professional and welcoming, making it the ideal place for students of all ages to begin their musical education.

From Hong Kong to Kuala Lumpur: A Legacy of Excellence

MC Music began its journey in Hong Kong and quickly grew into a massive network of over 30 locations. This growth was fueled by a commitment to high-quality instruction and a passion for music. Now, we are bringing that same level of prestige to Malaysia, ensuring that local students have access to the same resources and expertise that made us a leader in international music education.

The Importance of High-Quality Equipment

A student's progress can often be hindered by poor-quality instruments. That is why MC Music integrates a retail store with our academy. We ensure that every student practices on professional-grade drum kits. This not only makes the learning process more enjoyable but also helps students develop a better ear for tone and dynamics, which is crucial for any serious musician.

Building a Strong Musical Foundation

Our curriculum is designed to be comprehensive, covering everything from basic strokes to advanced performance techniques. We believe that a strong foundation is the key to longevity in music. By focusing on the fundamentals, we empower our students to explore any genre they choose, giving them the versatility to play in various musical settings and collaborate with other artists.

Elevate Your Skills with Professional Drum Classes

The difference between self-teaching and professional instruction is immense. By participating in drum classes at MC Music, you receive personalized feedback that speeds up your learning curve. Our instructors identify your strengths and weaknesses, tailoring their approach to ensure you overcome obstacles and reach your goals faster than you ever thought possible, all while having fun in the process.

  • Tailored lesson plans for individual goals.
  • Exposure to various drumming styles.
  • Interactive learning environments.
  • Regular performance opportunities.

Integrating Theory and Practice

While playing is the most exciting part, understanding music theory is equally important. We incorporate basic theory into our drum lessons so that students understand the "why" behind the "what." This knowledge allows drummers to communicate effectively with other musicians, making them more valuable members of a band or ensemble and enhancing their overall musical literacy and appreciation.

  1. Reading drum charts and sheet music.
  2. Understanding rhythmic subdivisions.
  3. Dynamics and expressive playing.
  4. Ear training and rhythm recognition.

Conclusion

The opening of MC Music in Kuala Lumpur is a significant milestone for the local music scene. By combining a world-class academy with a premium retail store, we provide a holistic experience for music lovers. If you are ready to take your drumming to the next level, join a community that values excellence and is dedicated to helping you achieve your full musical potential.

item.title: 모든 초보자가 알아야 할 크래프 테이블 에티켓
item.content:encoded:
크랩스 테이블에서 지켜야 할 에티켓은 초보 플레이어가 게임을 즐기면서도 다른 플레이어와 딜러와의 원활한 상호작용을 유지하기 위해 반드시 숙지해야 하는 중요한 요소입니다. 크랩스는 속도감 있고 사회적 상호작용이 많은 테이블 게임이기 때문에, 기본적인 행동 규범을 이해하지 못하면 게임 경험이 불편하거나 실수를 유발할 수 있습니다. 이러한 에티켓은 단순히 예의 범절을 넘어서, 게임의 흐름을 원활하게 하고 모든 참가자가 즐거운 경험을 할 수 있도록 돕는 기능을 합니다.

첫 번째로 중요한 것은 베팅 과정에서의 질서 유지입니다. 크랩스는 동시에 여러 플레이어가 다양한 베팅을 진행할 수 있는 구조이므로, 초보자는 자신의 베팅 순서와 금액을 명확히 하고, 딜러가 지시하는 규칙을 준수하는 것이 필요합니다. 무분별한 베팅이나 딜러 지시 무시는 다른 플레이어에게 혼란을 주고, 게임 속도를 늦출 수 있습니다. 따라서 기본적인 테이블 룰과 배팅 방법을 사전에 학습하고 참여하는 것이 바람직합니다.

두 번째로 크랩스 테이블에서는 승리와 패배에 대한 태도가 중요합니다. 과도한 환호나 실망 표현은 다른 플레이어에게 부담을 줄 수 있으며, 테이블 분위기를 해칠 수 있습니다. 초보자는 승리할 때는 적절히 즐기고, 패배할 때는 침착함을 유지하는 것이 좋습니다. 이러한 행동 방식은 다른 참가자에게 좋은 인상을 주고, 테이블 내 사회적 긴장감을 완화하는 데 도움을 줍니다.

또한 칩과 돈을 다루는 방식에서도 주의가 필요합니다. 크랩스 테이블에서는 칩을 손으로 던지거나 테이블 위에 무질서하게 놓는 행동은 금지됩니다. 딜러의 안내에 따라 칩을 정확히 배치하고, 자신의 베팅을 명확히 표시해야 합니다. 이러한 습관은 실수로 인한 베팅 오류를 줄이고, 테이블 운영을 원활하게 유지하는 데 기여합니다. 온라인 카지노 환경에서는 이러한 물리적 요소가 제거되지만, 실제 테이블과 유사한 매너와 게임 진행 이해는 여전히 중요합니다.

사회적 상호작용 측면에서도 에티켓이 중요합니다. 크랩스는 다른 플레이어와 소통하며 게임 분위기를 공유하는 특징이 있습니다. 초보자는 불필요한 간섭이나 조언을 강요하지 않고, 딜러와 다른 플레이어의 진행을 존중하는 태도를 유지하는 것이 좋습니다. 이를 통해 게임 참여자 모두가 즐겁게 게임을 경험할 수 있으며, 신뢰와 호감도 또한 자연스럽게 형성됩니다.

크랩스 테이블에서는 빠른 의사결정과 집중력이 요구되므로, 자신의 행동이 테이블 전체의 흐름에 영향을 줄 수 있음을 인식하는 것이 중요합니다. 플레이어는 게임의 진행 속도를 고려하며, 불필요한 질문이나 행동으로 딜러와 다른 참가자의 집중을 방해하지 않도록 주의해야 합니다. 또한, 문제 상황이나 규칙 이해에 어려움이 있을 때는 적절한 안내를 받거나 개인 파산과 같은 정보 페이지에서 참고 자료를 확인하여 정확한 이해를 돕는 것도 바람직합니다.

결론적으로 크랩스 테이블 에티켓은 단순한 예의 범절을 넘어, 게임 진행의 원활함과 모든 참가자의 만족도를 높이는 핵심 요소입니다. 초보 플레이어는 기본적인 배팅 질서, 칩 다루기, 감정 조절, 사회적 상호작용 규범을 숙지함으로써 보다 즐겁고 효율적인 게임 경험을 만들 수 있습니다. 이러한 에티켓을 준수하면 개인의 게임 경험뿐 아니라 테이블 전체의 분위기와 공정성도 함께 향상될 수 있습니다.

item.title: [홈서버 K3s CI/CD 구축] (4) CD 파이프라인 구축 (ArgoCD + Helm)
item.content:encoded:
Intro.

이번 편에서는 CD(Continuous Deployment) 파이프라인을 GitOps 방식으로 구축한다.

[주요 내용]

  • GitOps 레포지토리 구조 설계 (CICD-gitops)
  • Helm Chart 작성 (cicd-app, cicd-db)
  • ArgoCD 설치 및 설정
  • K8s Secret 관리
  • Harbor ImagePullSecret 설정
  • ArgoCD Application 생성 및 배포
  • GitHub Webhook을 통한 자동 배포

1. GitOps 레포지터리 생성

GitOps는 Git을 Single Source of Truth로 사용하는 배포 방식이다. kubectl get 명령어를 사용하지 않더라도 Git 레포를 통해 클러스터 현재 상태를 확인할 수 있다.

1-1. gitops 레포지터리 구성

CICD-gitops/
        ├── apps/
        │   ├── cicd-app/
        │   │   ├── Chart.yaml
        │   │   ├── values.yaml
        │   │   └── templates/
        │   │       ├── deployment.yaml
        │   │       ├── service.yaml
        │   │       └── ingress.yaml
        │   └── cicd-db/
        │       ├── Chart.yaml
        │       ├── values.yaml
        │       └── charts/
        │           └── mariadb-25.0.0.tgz

cicd-db는 배포 환경에서 사용하는 전용 DB다.cicd-app은 필자의 프로젝트명이다.

2. Helm Chart 작성 (cicd-app)

2-1. Chart.yaml

  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-app/Chart.yaml

    apiVersion: v2
        name: cicd-app
        version: 0.1.0
        description: CICD Spring Boot Application

    2-2. values.yaml

  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-app/values.yaml

    image:
        repository: {your_harbor_domain}/cicd/cicd-app
        tag: latest  # Jenkins가 자동으로 커밋 해시로 변경
        
        service:
        port: 8080
        
        ingress:
        host: {your_project_domain}

2-3. templates

  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-app/templates/deployment.yaml
    apiVersion: apps/v1
        kind: Deployment
        metadata:
        name: cicd-app
        spec:
        replicas: 1
        selector:
        matchLabels:
        app: cicd-app
        template:
        metadata:
        labels:
        app: cicd-app
        spec:
        containers:
        - name: cicd-app
        image: "{{ .Values.image.repository }}:{{ .Values.image.tag }}"
        ports:
        - containerPort: {{ .Values.service.port }}
        env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
        value: "prod"
        - name: DB_URL
        valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
        name: cicd-db-secret
        key: DB_URL
        - name: DB_USER
        valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
        name: cicd-db-secret
        key: DB_USER
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
        valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
        name: cicd-db-secret
        key: DB_PASSWORD
        livenessProbe:
        httpGet:
        path: /actuator/health/liveness
        port: {{ .Values.service.port }}
        initialDelaySeconds: 20
        periodSeconds: 10
        timeoutSeconds: 2
        failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
        httpGet:
        path: /actuator/health/readiness
        port: {{ .Values.service.port }}
        initialDelaySeconds: 10
        periodSeconds: 5
        timeoutSeconds: 2
        failureThreshold: 3
  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-app/templates/service.yaml
    apiVersion: v1
        kind: Service
        metadata:
        name: cicd-app
        labels:
        app: cicd-app
        spec:
        selector:
        app: cicd-app
        ports:
        - name: http
        port: 80
        targetPort: {{ .Values.service.port }}
  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-app/templates/ingress.yaml
    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
        kind: Ingress
        metadata:
        name: cicd-app
        spec:
        rules:
        - host: {{ .Values.ingress.host }}
        http:
        paths:
        - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
        service:
        name: cicd-app
        port:
        number: 80

3. Helm Chart 작성 (cicd-db)

3-1. Chart.yaml

  • [gitops repo] apps/cicd-db/Chart.yaml
    apiVersion: v2
        name: cicd-db
        version: 0.1.0
        description: MariaDB for CICD Application

dependencies:

  • name: mariadb version: 25.0.0 repository: https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami
    ## 3-2. values.yaml
        - [gitops repo] `apps/cicd-db/values.yaml````
        ```yaml
        mariadb:
        auth:
        rootPassword: "your_maridb_pw"
        database: "your_project_db_prod"
        username: "your_project_db_user"
        password: "your_mariadb_pw"
        primary:
        persistence:
        enabled: true
        size: 8Gi

4. Spring Boot Production 설정

4-1. 배포용 yaml 파일 작성

  • [your_project] src/main/resources/application-prod.yaml

    spring:
        datasource:
        url: ${DB_URL}
        username: ${DB_USER}
        password: ${DB_PASSWORD}
        driver-class-name: org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver
        
        jpa:
        hibernate:
        ddl-auto: validate
        properties:
        hibernate:
        format_sql: true
        show-sql: false
        
        server:
        port: 8080
        
        management:
        endpoints:
        web:
        exposure:
        include: health,info,prometheus
        endpoint:
        health:
        probes:
        enabled: true

    github에 변경 사항을 push 해준다.

5. ArgoCD 설치

5-1. ArgoCD 설치 및 설정

  • argoCD namespace 생성 및 argoCD 설치

    # Namespace 생성
        sudo k3s kubectl create ns argocd
        
        # ArgoCD 설치
        sudo k3s kubectl apply -n argocd -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/argoproj/argo-cd/stable/manifests/install.yaml
        
        # Pod 상태 확인 (모두 Running 될 때까지 대기)
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd get pods

  • argoCD server를 NodePort로 노출

    sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd patch svc argocd-server -p '{"spec":{"type":"NodePort"}}'
        
        # 할당된 포트 확인
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd get svc argocd-server

  • argoCD insecure 모드 전환 NPM에서 HTTPS 처리해주기에 ArgoCD는 HTTP로 동작하도록 설정한다.

    # ConfigMap 수정
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd patch configmap argocd-cmd-params-cm --type merge -p '{"data":{"server.insecure":"true"}}'
        
        # 외부 URL 설정
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd patch configmap argocd-cm --type merge -p '{"data":{"url":"https://argocd.cicd.kmg22.me"}}'
        
        # ArgoCD Server 재시작
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd rollout restart deployment argocd-server
        
        # 재시작 확인
        sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd get pods -l app.kubernetes.io/name=argocd-server

5-2. NPM 도메인 연결

  • NPM 설정

    Domain Destination
    argocd.{project}.{your_domain} http://{홈서버IP}:{ArgoCD_NortPort}
    [Advanced 탭]
    ```
    proxy_set_header Host $host;
    proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
    proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
    ```
    ## 5-3. ArgoCD 접속 테스트

  • your_argocd_domain 접속

    ID PW
    admin sudo k3s kubectl -n argocd get secret argocd-initial-admin-secret -o jsonpath="{.data.password}"

6. project namespace 및 secret 생성

6-1. cicd namespace 생성

  • cicd namespace 생성

    sudo k3s kubectl create namespace cicd

    6-2. Harbor ImagePullSecret 생성

    Private Harbor를 사용하는 경우 K8s가 이미지를 Pull 할 수 있도록 설정

  • harbor-regcred 생성

    sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd create secret docker-registry harbor-regcred \
        --docker-server={your_harbor_domain} \
        --docker-username=admin \
        --docker-password='{your_harbor_pw}'

    6-3. ServiceAccount에 ImagePullSecret 추가

  • serviceaccount에 harbor-regcred 추가

    sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd patch serviceaccount default -p '{"imagePullSecrets":[{"name":"harbor-regcred"}]}'
        
        # 확인
        sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd get sa default -o yaml | grep -A3 imagePullSecrets

    6-4. DB Secret 생성

  • cicd-db-secret 생성

    sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd create secret generic cicd-db-secret \
        --from-literal=DB_URL='jdbc:mariadb://cicd-db-mariadb:3306/cicd_prod' \
        --from-literal=DB_USER='cicd_user' \
        --from-literal=DB_PASSWORD='your_mariadb_pw'
        
        # 확인
        sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd get secret cicd-db-secret

7. ArgoCD 설정

7-1. GitOps 레포 등록

  • [argocd] settings → Repositories → connection repo

7-2. ArgoCD Application 생성 (cicd-db)

  • [argocd] applications → New app cicd-db 생성 후 SYNC 실행

7-3. ArgoCD Application 생성

  • [argocd] applications → New app cicd-app 생성 후SYNC 실행

7-4. 배포 확인

  • [홈서버] 배포 확인
    sudo k3s kubectl get ns | grep cicd || true
        sudo k3s kubectl -n cicd get pods,svc,ingress

8. NPM 도메인 연결

8-1. Traefik NodPort 확인

  • Traefik NodePort 확인 K3s는 Traefik을 Ingress Controller로 사용

    sudo k3s kubectl -n kube-system get svc traefik

    8-2. NPM 설정

  • NPM 설정

    Domain Destination
    {service}.{project}.{your_domain} http://{홈서버IP}:{Traefik_HTTP_NordPort}

9. 배포 확인

9-1. 애플리케이션 접속

  • your_service_domain 프로젝트의 swagger 및 서비스 api가 잘 접속되는 걸 확인할 수 있다!

10. Jenkins Pipeline 업데이트(Gitops) 연동

10-1. Github Personal Access Token 생성

  • [github] Settings → Developer settings → Personal access tokens → Fine-grained tokens → Generate new token 특정 레포 전용 token 발급

10-2. Jenkins Credentials 등록

  • [jenkins] Jenkins 관리 → Credentials → Add Credentials gitops-token 등록

10-3. Jenkinsfile 업데이트

  • [your_project] Jenkinsfile

    pipeline {
        GITOPS_REPO_URL = 'https://github.com/kmg22/CICD-gitops.git'
        GITOPS_VALUES   = 'apps/cicd-app/values.yaml'
        }
        ---
        stage('Docker Build & Push to Harbor') {
        steps {
        withCredentials([usernamePassword(credentialsId: 'harbor-creds', usernameVariable: 'H_USER', passwordVariable: 'H_PASS')]) {
        sh '''
        set -eux
        IMAGE=${HARBOR_REGISTRY}/${HARBOR_PROJECT}/${APP_NAME}:${GIT_COMMIT}
        
        docker login ${HARBOR_REGISTRY} -u "$H_USER" -p "$H_PASS"
        docker build -t $IMAGE .
        docker push $IMAGE
        
        docker tag $IMAGE ${HARBOR_REGISTRY}/${HARBOR_PROJECT}/${APP_NAME}:latest
        docker push ${HARBOR_REGISTRY}/${HARBOR_PROJECT}/${APP_NAME}:latest
        '''
        }
        }
        }
        
        stage('Update GitOps Repo') {
        steps {
        withCredentials([string(credentialsId: 'gitops-token', variable: 'GITOPS_TOKEN')]) {
        sh '''
        set -eux
        rm -rf cicd-gitops
        git clone https://$GITOPS_TOKEN@github.com/kmg22/CICD-gitops.git cicd-gitops
        cd cicd-gitops
        
        # values.yaml의 tag를 커밋 해시로 변경
        sed -i "s/^  tag: .*/  tag: ${GIT_COMMIT}/" ${GITOPS_VALUES}
        
        git config user.email "ssukmg22@gmail.com"
        git config user.name "kmg22"
        
        git add ${GITOPS_VALUES}
        git commit -m "chore(gitops): deploy ${APP_NAME} ${GIT_COMMIT}" || echo "no changes"
        git push origin main
        '''
        }
        }
        }

    github 업데이트 적용

11. Github Webhook 설정

11-1. Github Webhook 생성

  • [your_project-gitops repo] Settings → Webhooks → Add webhook
    • PayLoad : https://{your_jenkins_domain}/github-webhook/
    • cotent type : application/json

11-2. Jenkins Job Trigger 켜기

  • [jenkins] Jenkins Job 설정→ Configure(구성) → Build Triggers
    • Github hook trigger for GITScm polling

(+) [Trouble Shooting] helm chart mariDB version 오류

helm 차트에 지정된 db 버전이 맞지 않아 오류가 발생하는 경우도 존재한다. helm을 설치 가능한 환경(필자는 윈도우 유저이기에 홈서버 우분투에서 진행)을 찾아 가능한 버전을 확인해준다.

# helm 설치
        curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helm/helm/main/scripts/get-helm-3 | bash
        helm version
        
        # CICD-gitops repo 가져오기
        git clone https://github.com/{your_github}/{your_gitops_repo}.git
        cd {your_gitops_repo}/apps/cicd-db
        helm repo add bitnami https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami
        
        # gitnami mariadb 차트 버전 목록 확인
        helm search repo bitnami/mariadb --versions | head -20
        
        # apps/cicd-db/Chart.yaml 버전  수정
        25.0.0
        
        # dependency update
        helm dependency update

수행하면 charts/mariadb-25.0.0.tgz, Chart.lock 파일이 생성되는 것을 확인할 수 있다.

item.title: Random Video Chat: Meet New People Instantly
item.content:encoded:
Random video chat has become certainly one of the most used ways to get in touch with people across the globe. Unlike traditional messaging apps or social media marketing, it offers instant face-to-face interaction with strangers. These platforms are created to create spontaneous conversations, allowing users to explore new friendships, cultures, and ideas without any prior connection. With modern safety features and AI moderation, users can engage confidently while enjoying the unpredictability of meeting someone new.

How Random Video Chat Platforms Work The core function of random video chat platforms would be to pair users with strangers in real time. When an individual logs in, the system automatically matches them with another available participant. The interaction usually starts immediately, creating an all-natural and unscripted conversation. Some platforms also allow users to incorporate text chat alongside video, offering flexibility for different comfort levels.

AI moderation ensures that interactions remain safe and appropriate Start chatting. It could detect offensive language or content and intervene when necessary. Many platforms provide options to skip users or report inappropriate behavior, giving participants control over their experience. This balance of freedom and safety is among the reasons random video chat has grown in popularity.

Benefits of Using Random Video Chat One of many main advantages of random video chat is the chance to meet people outside your usual social circle. Users can encounter different cultures, languages, and perspectives within a conversation. This exposure not only broadens understanding but can also inspire new ideas and personal growth.

Another benefit may be the sense of immediacy and excitement. There's no awaiting friend requests, approvals, or matches. The instant connection makes the knowledge feel fresh and engaging every time. Additionally, it may help reduce feelings of loneliness by providing real human interaction that text alone cannot replicate.

Random video chat may also be a functional tool for practicing communication skills. Speaking with strangers encourages confidence, adaptability, and conversational flow. Many users believe it is an enjoyable way to boost social skills while making new friends at the same time.

Tips for a Positive Experience To take pleasure from random video chat fully, it is important to stay respectful and open-minded. Being polite, patient, and attentive improves the quality of conversations. Users should avoid sharing sensitive personal information and make the most of privacy controls. A great camera, clear lighting, and functional audio make interactions smoother and more enjoyable.

Random video chat platforms continue steadily to innovate, blending social interaction with technology in unique ways. They give a fantastic opportunity to meet people worldwide instantly and without barriers. For casual conversation, cultural exchange, or just entertainment, these platforms have redefined how people connect online.

item.title: 바카라가 하이 롤러로 인기 있는 이유
item.content:encoded:
바카라는 전 세계 카지노에서 고액 베팅 플레이어, 즉 하이롤러들에게 특히 높은 인기를 유지해 온 대표적인 테이블 게임으로 알려져 있습니다. 규칙이 비교적 단순하면서도 한 번의 베팅 규모가 매우 크게 설정될 수 있다는 점이 고액 플레이 환경에 잘 맞기 때문입니다. 플레이어는 플레이어(Player), 뱅커(Banker), 타이(Tie) 중 하나에 베팅하기만 하면 되므로 전략적 복잡성이 낮고, 큰 금액을 빠르게 걸 수 있는 구조가 형성됩니다. 이러한 단순성과 고액 베팅 가능성의 결합이 바카라를 하이롤러 선호 게임으로 자리 잡게 만든 핵심 요인입니다.

하이롤러들이 바카라를 선호하는 또 다른 이유는 낮은 하우스 엣지 구조에 있습니다. 특히 뱅커 베팅은 대부분의 카지노 게임 중에서도 비교적 낮은 카지노 우위를 가지며, 장기적으로 플레이어에게 유리한 확률에 가까운 베팅 옵션으로 인식됩니다. 고액 베팅 환경에서는 작은 확률 차이도 기대값에 큰 영향을 미치기 때문에, 하이롤러들은 수학적으로 가장 안정적인 선택을 선호하는 경향이 있습니다. 이러한 확률 구조 덕분에 바카라는 큰 금액을 반복적으로 베팅하는 플레이어에게 심리적 안정감을 제공합니다.

카지노 운영 측면에서도 바카라는 하이롤러 유치를 위한 핵심 게임으로 활용됩니다. 많은 오프라인 카지노에서는 별도의 프라이빗 바카라 룸이나 VIP 살롱을 운영하여 고액 플레이어에게 전용 공간과 서비스를 제공합니다. 이러한 환경은 프라이버시, 편안함, 그리고 고급스러운 경험을 동시에 제공하며, 하이롤러 고객과 카지노 간 장기 관계 형성에 중요한 역할을 합니다. 온라인 카지노에서도 라이브 딜러 바카라와 고액 테이블 옵션이 제공되며, 이용자들은 게임 선택 시 토토사이트 정보를 참고하여 베팅 한도와 서비스 수준을 비교하기도 합니다.

바카라는 플레이 속도가 빠르다는 점에서도 고액 플레이어에게 매력적입니다. 게임 진행이 신속하고 베팅 결정 과정이 단순하기 때문에 짧은 시간 내에 큰 금액이 오가는 플레이가 가능합니다. 이는 시간 대비 베팅 볼륨을 높이려는 하이롤러의 플레이 스타일과 잘 맞습니다. 복잡한 전략 판단이 필요한 게임보다 빠르게 결과가 반복되는 구조가 고액 베팅 환경에서 선호되는 이유입니다.

문화적 요인도 바카라의 하이롤러 인기와 밀접하게 연결되어 있습니다. 특히 아시아 카지노 시장에서 바카라는 전통적으로 높은 선호도를 보이며, 마카오와 같은 주요 카지노 지역에서는 전체 게임 매출의 상당 부분을 차지합니다. 이러한 문화적 선호는 고액 플레이 문화와 결합되어 바카라를 대표적인 하이롤러 게임으로 강화해 왔습니다. 결과적으로 글로벌 카지노에서도 바카라는 고액 고객 유치를 위한 핵심 상품으로 유지되고 있습니다.

또한 바카라는 결과가 비교적 독립적이고 전략 개입 여지가 적기 때문에, 고액 플레이어에게 심리적으로 공정한 게임으로 인식되기 쉽습니다. 플레이어의 기술이나 판단이 크게 개입되지 않기 때문에 승패가 순수 확률에 의해 결정된다는 인식이 강하며, 이는 큰 금액을 걸 때 느낄 수 있는 부담을 줄여 줍니다. 하이롤러들은 복잡한 의사결정보다 확률 기반 결과를 선호하는 경우가 많으며, 바카라는 이러한 요구에 부합합니다.

결론적으로 바카라가 하이롤러에게 인기가 높은 이유는 단순한 규칙, 낮은 하우스 엣지, 빠른 게임 속도, 고액 베팅 환경, 그리고 문화적 선호가 결합된 결과입니다. 카지노는 이러한 특성을 활용해 VIP 서비스를 중심으로 바카라 경험을 강화하고 있으며, 플레이어 역시 자신의 베팅 규모와 선호에 맞는 게임을 선택합니다. 이러한 구조적 특성 덕분에 바카라는 세계적으로 고액 플레이의 상징적인 카지노 게임으로 자리 잡고 있습니다.
